title: The No. 1 Retirement-Planning Problem
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: To solve for spending in retirement, you need to plug in how much capital you have, what your rate of return is and how much time you have – that last item being impossible to know. Longevity tables meant to offer guidance may understate the actuarially correct  figures by two to three years. How can we devise a spending plan amidst these uncertainties - plus numerous other hurdles? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
